SA21n2914:29: sahajasiddhir bhavet tasmāt [ avācyaṃ ] sahajaṃ smṛtaṃ ||2 ||
SA21n2914:36: khadhātau ca bhagaṃ dhyātvā madhye kurvīta bhāvanā
SA21n2914:47: khadhātāv iti padmeti jñānaṃ bhagam iti smṛtam |
SA21n2914:62: yathodayaṃ bhavet śūnyaṃ dvividhaṃ sahajaṃ sthitam ||5 ||
SA21n2914:69: yoṣitā tu bhavet prajñā upāyaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtam
SA21n2914:73: paścād anayor dvaividhyaṃ vivṛti [ saṃvṛti ] bhedataḥ ||6 ||
SA21n2914:80: pūṃṣi tāvat dvaividhyaṃ śukraṃ tasya sukhaṃ ca vā |
SA21n2914:84: prajñāyām api yathā pūṃsi śukraṃ tasya sukhaṃ ca vā ||7 ||
SA21n2914:91: ataḥ eva hi ānandaḥ caturṇāṃ saṃprabhedataḥ | ( 1 )
SA21n2914:115: viramānandaṃ virāgaḥ syāt sahajānandaṃ tu śeṣataḥ ||9 ||
SA21n2914:133: [ prathamaṃ ] uṣmāyate prajñā dvitīyaṃ dhūma [ va ] tī bhavet |
SA21n2914:137: tṛtīye tyajati sphalī caturthe jvalitā yathā ||11 ||
SA21n2914:144: caṇḍāli [ = lī ] jvalate nābhau dahati pañcatathāgatān |
SA21n2914:148: dahati locanādīn dagdhe ham sravate śaśī ||12 ||
SA21n2914:155: pūrvaṃ yadva [ c ca ] dvaividhyaṃ bodhicittaṃ kṛtaṃ ji [ naiḥ ] |
SA21n2914:166: rūpaṃ śabdaḥ tathā gandho [ ra ] saḥ sparśas tathaiva ca | ( 2 )
SA21n2914:190: nānyena kathayate sahajaṃ na kasminn api labhyate |
SA21n2914:221: sarve tāni samānī [ ti ] draṣṭavyāni tattvabhāvanaiḥ ||1 ||
SA21n2914:228: hīnaṃ sukṣmapadārthaṃ tu utkṛṣṭaṃ bhāvam ucyate |
SA21n2914:243: [ samā ] ni tulya ceṣṭāni samarasaṃ tattvabhāvanaiḥ ||3 ||
SA21n2914:250: samaṃ tulyaṃ ity uktaṃ ta [ d e ] vaikarasaṃ smṛtam |
SA21n2914:265: kulasevā [ = vayā ] bhavet siddhiḥ sarvakāmapradā śubhā ||5 || ( 3 )
SA21n2914:282: amoghaś ca tathā proktā sattvānāṃ siddhihetunā ||6 ||
SA21n2914:289: akṣobhyaḥ vajram ity uktaṃ amitābha padmam eva ca |
SA21n2914:293: ratnasaṃbhavaḥ ratnaṃ vairocana tathāgata [ ś ca ] ||7 ||
SA21n2914:300: amoghaḥ karma ity uktam kulāny etāni saṃkṣipet |
SA21n2914:311: trāse na rocate loke hakārādikulāni tu |
SA21n2914:315: mūḍhānām upadeśo hi prakopāya na śāntaye ||9 ||
SA21n2914:322: hevajro jñāyate tena śraddhayā vā śrute sati |
SA21n2914:337: [ sahajatvāt dvidhā ] bhedāt pañcapañca pṛthak pṛthak ||11 ||
SA21n2914:348: nakārād eko bhayād vā gupta lokapravādataḥ ||12 ||
SA21n2914:355: bāhye kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ ca śuklavarṇaṃ raktaṃ ca |
SA21n2914:366: sahajasaṃgataṃ hi jagat sarvaṃ yad uta bhuvanatrayam |
SA21n2914:370: tenaiva vyāpitaṃ [ sarvaṃ ] pānamaḥ ya jagat ||14 ||
SA21n2914:377: evaṃ matvā tu yogī ahaṃ etādṛśo dhruvam ( 4 )
SA21n2914:397: khāne pāne tathā [ snāne ] jāgratah svapne'pi cintayet |
SA21n2914:401: sātatyaṃ tu tato yānti sukh [ ā ] vaty [ abhi ] kāṅkṣiṇaḥ ||16 ||
SA21n2914:425: yad uktaṃ bāhyaṃ ca yat tu samomathevatāyane |
SA21n2914:440: sadā śaucyan tu kartavyaṃ na kāyācitavācane ||2 ||
SA21n2914:462: sevayā sevakānāṃ tu caret sā caryeti smṛta ||4 ||
SA21n2914:486: bhāvyate hi jagat sarvaṃ manasā yan na bhāvyate |
SA21n2914:512: svasaṃvedyā bhavet siddhiḥ svasaṃvedyā hi bhāvanā ||8 ||
SA21n2914:523: svayaṃ kartā svayaṃ hartā svayaṃ rājā svayaṃ prabhūḥ || 9 ||
SA21n2914:530: rāgadveṣaṃ tathaive [ rṣyā ] moho māno tathaiva ca |
SA21n2914:555: paramārthaṃ samā [ śri ] tya sarvākāreṇa tiṣṭhati ||12 ||
SA21n2914:566: divya cakṣuḥ divya śrota divyaghrāṇaḥ divya sparśaḥ divya rasaḥ divya ( 6 )
